Description: Dr. Li is the Associate Director for Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) at the Fred Hutchinson/University of Washington/Seattle Children’s Cancer Consortium, and he co-founded the Cancer Center DEI Network which engages DEI leaders from across the nation’s cancer centers. In this session he will provide his perspective on addressing the new Plan to Enhance Diversity component of NCI’s Cancer Center Support Grant program based on lessons learned and shared through the DEI Network and his own experience. This will include discussion of approaches to advance a climate and culture of inclusive excellence, developing career enhancement programs to support diverse trainees, strategies to recruit and retain faculty from underrepresented backgrounds, and efforts to prepare the next generation of diverse cancer center leaders.
SearchResultBody: ME29. Plan to Enhance Diversity: Opportunities, Challenges, Best Practices, and Innovative Strategies to Advance a Culture of Inclusive Excellence at Cancer Centers
Title: Plan to Enhance Diversity: Opportunities, Challenges, Best Practices, and Innovative Strategies to Advance a Culture of Inclusive Excellence at Cancer Centers
